DataElement.preferredName: Lesion Description Performed Observation Outcome Report Date and Time ISO21090.TS.DATETIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A characterization of the extent of any localized or abnormal change in the structure of part of an organ or tissue. The date (and time) on which the result is reported.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lesion Description Performed Observation Outcome Report Date and Time
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A short textual account; having provided a short account.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: A short textual account; having provided a short account.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains TS so that it's precision can not be more precise than seconds.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)
